name: Priority: Medium
description: The issue is important but not urgent.

name: Priority: Low
description: The issue is not urgent and not important.

name: Priority: High
description: The issue is urgent but not important.

name: Priority: Critical
description: The issue is urgent and important.

name: Type: Maintenance
description: An improvement of something that already exists.

name: Type: Question
discription: Questions that are relevant to discuss.

name: Type: Enhancement
description: Something that new that adds value.

name: Type: Bug
description: A problem that needs to be fixed.

name: Status: Blocked
description: It is not possible to process this issue for any reason.

name: Status: In Progress
description: Someone is aware of this issue and is currently resolving it.

name: Kind: Doc
description: This issue belongs to the documentation.

name: Kind: Code
description: This issue belongs to the source code.

name: Kind: Support
description: This issue is a support request.
